27  /* move here to fix bcc32 Warning W8026 */
28  int archive::put_pointer(void* object) {
29  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_vPointerstored.size(); ++i) {
30  if (m_vPointerstored[i] == object) return (int) i;
31  }
32 
33  //There isn't inside list
34  m_vPointerstored.push_back(object);
35 
36  return -1;
37  }
38 
40 
41  bin_archive& bin_archive::operator<<(std::string& str) {
42  unsigned int len = static_cast<unsigned int> (str.length());
43  write(&len, sizeof (len), 1);
44 
45  if (len > 0) {
46  //write (&len, sizeof(len), 1);
47  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
48  char ch = str[i];
49  write(&ch, sizeof (ch), 1);
50  }
51  }
52 
53  return (*this);
54  }
55 
57 
58  bin_archive& bin_archive::operator>>(std::string& str) {
59  unsigned int len = 0;
60  operator>>(len);
61 
62  std::string str1(len, ' ');
63  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
64  char ch;
65  read(&ch, sizeof (ch), 1);
66  str1[i] = ch;
67  }
68 
69  str = str1;
70  return (*this);
71  }
72 
73  file_archive::file_archive(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode) {
74  open(file_name, mode == load);
75  }
76 
77  size_t file_archive::write(const void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) {
78  //size_t written= fwrite( buffer, size, count, fp );
79  size_t written = 0;
80  for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
81  stream.write((char*) buffer, (int) size);
82 
83  return written;
84  }
85 
86  size_t file_archive::read(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) {
87  //size_t ridden= fread( buffer, size, count, fp );
88  size_t ridden = 0;
89  for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
90  stream.read((char*) buffer, (int) size);
91  return ridden;
92  }
93 
99  void file_archive::open(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode) {
100  open(file_name, mode == load);
101  }
102 
104 
105  void file_archive::open(std::string sName, bool loading) {
106  close();
107  //fp=fopen(sName.c_str(), loading ? "r" : "w");
108  stream.open(sName.c_str(), (loading ? std::ios_base::in : std::ios_base::out) | std::ios_base::binary);
109 
110  set_loading(loading);
111  }
112 
113 
114 }
